attributes.action: Bring back A and T levels to colleges in the uk
attributes.additional_details: I want to do this petition as I want a better life for people who are moving up to college within the next couple of years.
attributes.background: To bring back A and T levels as they are good to do at college and push you on to place in higher education such as university and academy’s and these can push you on to better jobs like teaching, government jobs, and healthcare

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Do not introduce a new 'Advanced British Standard Qualification': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/647461

Do not make Mathematics and English a requirement up to 18: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/647430
